name: Recondite
description:
In a world wrought with criminal activity and industrial espionage. A young alien with an affinity for technology and stealth makes his money selling information to the most powerful politicians and business conglomerates in the galaxy. 

A project I was working on in my second year of university where we had to make a vertical slice/single level of a larger game concept and prototype mechanics and level design. All characters were modeled and textured by me in Blender and Substance Painter respectively.

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated. The game is currently not being developed further since I have other projects for now but who knows if it might turn into something in the future.
